original_text: Shall they not rise up suddenly that shall bite thee, and awake that shall vex thee, and thou shalt be for booties unto them?
korean_text: 너를 억누를 자들이 갑자기 일어나지 않겠느냐 너를 괴롭힐 자들이 깨어나지 않겠느냐 네가 그들에게 노략을 당하지 않겠느냐

sentences.original_text: Shall they not rise up suddenly
and awake that shall vex thee
and thou shalt be for booties unto them?
